useCase.name: Play Rock Paper Scissors
useCase.description: Use case for playing single or multiplayer mode.

preconditions.precondition: User is in the HomeRock component of the application.

mainSequence.step: User renders the HomeRock component on the screen.
The HomeRock component displays the title "Piedra, Papel, Tijera".
User clicks on the "Un Jugador" button.
HomeRock sets the game mode as 'single'.
User clicks on the "Dos Jugadores" button.
HomeRock sets the game mode as 'multi'.
User clicks on the "Back to Home" button.
HomeRock triggers onBackToHome for navigation back to the Home screen.
